Digital Book Application
  • Home
  • ALL BOOKS
  • SUBSCRIBED BOOKS
  • Login
  • Sign Up
  • {{ username }}
  • LogOut
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TokenStorageService } from './_services/token-storage.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { private roles: string[] = []; isLoggedIn = false; showAuthorBoard = false; showReaderBoard = false; username?: string; constructor(private tokenStorageService: TokenStorageService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.isLoggedIn = !!this.tokenStorageService.getToken(); if (this.isLoggedIn) { const user = this.tokenStorageService.getUser(); this.roles = user.roles; this.showAuthorBoard = this.roles.includes('ROLE_AUTHOR'); this.showReaderBoard = this.roles.includes('ROLE_READER'); this.username = user.username; } } logout(): void { this.tokenStorageService.signOut(); window.location.reload(); } }
